introduction.para: The structure properties pane allows editing of the structure name and free text annotations. It is also shows size variable name and voltge variable name (for membranes).

appearance.para: At the top, there is the one-line structure name text field. Below, there is the one-line size variable name text field. For membranes, there is the one-line voltage variable name text field below that. Below, using most of the panels space, is the multi-line free text annotation text field.

operations.para: Structure name and free text annotations can be changed by editing the appropriate text fields. A structure name will be rejected if already in use by another structure.
